2010-06-27

Whatever happened to… National Park

I just came across a VCD that John of National Park must've sent me when I bought a single of theirs four or five years back. I couldn't get the damn thing to work but I guess that this is one of the videos I would've found if I had...

National Park made a lovely noise but sadly (almost) everything I have of theirs is on vinyl and I'm currently without an amp so I'll have to make do with what I can find out there...

They have...

* A Wikipedia entry
* A (neglected) web page
* A few other videos on YouTube
